name: Digi Bill
author: Adeona Technologies

sections.description:
We’ve revolutionized conventional bill that mostly goes to a dustbin as a marketing asset. Reach your customers while in the store and improve customer experience.
ECO Friendly – go green and eliminate your operational costs for printing materials.
Notification SMS – you can use bill notification messages as a channel to communicate promotions while customers are on your shop premises.
Data Collection – Build your customer base, Get user experience analysis.
Digital Bill – Place your promotions within the Digital Bill. Send promotional messages to your customer base.

Features

  1. Sending a Digital Bill to Customers Mobile Number.
  2. Customers can view their bill anytime.

Installation and Use

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the plugin files to the directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  • You can receive the Digital Bill to your Mobile Phone after Making the Payment.

It’s not working

  • Step 1. Check if Woocommerce Plugin is activated.
  • Step 2. Check if DigiBill Plugin is activated.
  • Step 3. Deactivate all plugins and reactivate DigiBill Plugin.
